text: AT&T; Pogo was a web browser based on Mozilla Firefox's codebase made by AT&T; and Vizible. A testing version was handed to a small group of people but the project was later discontinued when Vizible sold its intellectual property to Open Text. == Features == The testing version had these features: * Being able to make multiple home pages. * Tabs showing a small picture for each open page. * A way to look at and manage Internet bookmarks. * A way to look at and control internet history. * A search feature to find bookmarks and history. == References == Category:Web browsers Category:Web browsers based on Firefox Category:ATT
title: AT&T Pogo
